titles.title: Electric CARS Act
Electric Credit Access Ready at Sale Act of 2014

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and extend the new qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicles credit and to enable such credit to be converted to a rebate at the point of sale.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: 5/6/2014--Introduced. Electric Credit Access Ready at Sale Act of 2014 or the Electric CARS Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the maximum amount of the tax credit for new qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicles to $7,500 and to extend the termination date of such credit to December 31, 2020. Permits the credit to be assigned to the sellers of such vehicles.
